pros: Great people to work with. A small town hospital with access like a big city.
cons: I do not have any complaints.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Crosby, MN
pros: Work along side friends and coworkers, close to Cuyuna biking trails, stepping stone and exposure to healthcare career.
cons: Management, dishonest, scheduling with nursing students ***beware get it in writing after interview that they will work with your schedule, low pay, level four trauma center, exposure to advanced healthcare experiences, not much room for advancement.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant in Saint Cloud, MN
pros: Good salary and work enviroment
cons: Don’t work around school schedule

pros: Great sense of community, teamwork, and values.  Always promotes from within first.  Supervisors are always open to "brainstorming" and getting feedback from us little people.  They are highly respected in the community, and I was never ashamed to tell people where I worked.  Usually, when I did share the name of my employer, people would have a positive story or experience to share with me.  Would never have left if we had not moved out of state.
cons: Benefit package could be more affordable (may have changed since I worked there?)  Most employees could not afford to cover their whole family.  Retirement and other benefits were okay--just the medical left something to be desired.

pros:
Management has started doing quarterly meetings that are open to all staff, which makes them easier to approach with questions and concerns.

You get all the medical benefits even at just a .6 (48 hours per pay period) and the benefits person is really nice about explaining the details.

The food in the cafeteria is really good.
cons: There have been a lot of changes recently  and it is sometimes a challenge to keep up with it all.

review_title: Unfair treatment management does not comply with their CORE values
pros: there's no pros to working at cuyuna regional medical center
cons: You must be a yes person, doesn't give credit when credit is due, only focuses on the negatives NEVER the positives

job_title: Network/Systems Administrator in Elk River, MN
pros: Great place to work.
cons: You won't want to leave

cons: Too many hours not enough staff
